name: Skol Cup (single) - Concrete and Ceramic
description:
Appropriating their name from the Norwegian word “Skål”, the Skol cups continue The Design Division’s quest to awaken renewed appreciation for some of the more mundane materials surrounding us.

Combining two typically contrasting materials, the Skol cups are not just usable - they are also thought-provoking. The heavily textured concrete is a stark contradiction to the clean lines and polished finish of the glazed ceramic.

The ceramic halves are dishwasher safe and can be separated from the concrete to simplify cleaning. By it's nature, the concrete varies in colour and finish between cups - we like to think it adds individual character to each one. The concrete has been treated with an application of tung oil and beeswax, and should not be left immersed in liquids for extended periods of time. If you're wondering how strong the concrete is - it will survive a drop on the floor better than the ceramic half will, but should still be treated with the love and care it deserves!

This listing is for a single cup only. Cups are shown together to illustrate the different colours and how they look together. For more images see: http://thedesigndivision.com.au/portfolio/skol-cups/

You can expect to receive your Skol cup approx. 2 weeks after purchase. 

Diameter: 95mm (3 3/4in)
Height: 130mm (5 3/16in)
Weight: 430g (15oz)
Capacity: 400mL (13 fluid oz)
